abilities.text: Passive - Once per round, Prevent up to 1 CC loss on this Personnel
-CC (1) - If 2+ Personnel in sector Beta: Spend 1 CC, then Move a Personnel in sector Beta to sector Lambda, then Add 1 CC to this Personnel
Passive - when an Entity's effect resolves: Recompute module graph
Burnout - When this Personnel's CC is reduced to 0: Send this Personnel to the Abyss
